channel.title: rtl-sdr on Debashish Sahu
channel.description: Recent content in rtl-sdr on Debashish Sahu

item.title: Using RTL-SDR to Read Values From Wireless Electric/Gas/Water Meters
item.description: An attempt to use RTL-SDR to read values from wireless electric/gas/water meters and visualize these values on Home Assistant. Software Based on bemasher/RTLAMR Project: https://github.com/bemasher/rtlamr
